description: This file defines a UI Fragment named NotesFragment for an Android application, responsible for displaying a list of notes and handling user interactions such as toggling layout and opening note details.

classes.name: NotesFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass responsible for displaying and managing a list of notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, enabling options menu.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the UI layout, initializes RecyclerView and its adapter.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Reloads data when the fragment resumes.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches notes from repository and updates the adapter, manages empty view visibility.

methods.name: setLayoutManager
methods.description: Sets the RecyclerView's layout manager to GridLayoutManager with togglable span count.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu for toggling layout.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selection to toggle between grid and list layouts.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of NotesFragment.
